card-token-creation.description: parameter cardNumber can not be null/empty

message.es: Ingresa el número de tu tarjeta.

parameter cardExpirationYear can not be null/empty
parameter docType can not be null/empty
The parameter cardholder.document.subtype can not be null or empty
parameter docNumber can not be null/empty

message.en: There's something wrong with that number. Please reenter.
message.es: Hay algo mal en ese número. Vuelve a ingresarlo.

issuing-payment.description: Cannot operate between users from different countries

message.es: No puedes realizar pagos a usuarios de otros países.
message.en: You can not make payments to users in other countries.

issuing-payment.description: Invalid number of shares for this payment_method_id

message.es:
payment_method_id no procesa pagos en installments cuotas.
Elige otra tarjeta u otro medio de pago.
message.en: payment_method_id does not process payments in installments Choose another card or another payment method.

issuing-payment.description: The action requested is not valid for the current payment state

message.en: We could not process your payment.

issuing-payment.description: Cannot pay this amount with this paymentMethod

message.es:
payment_method_id no procesa pagos del monto seleccionado.
Elige otra tarjeta u otro medio de pago.
message.en:
payment_method_id does not process payments for the selected amount.
Choose another card or another payment method.
We could not process your payment.

issuing-payment.description: The payer_id cannot do payments currently
The payer_id cannot do payments with this payment_method_id

message.en: We could not process your payment.

message.es:
payment_method_id no está disponible en este momento.
Elige otra tarjeta u otro medio de pago.
message.en:
payment_method_id is not available at this time.
Choose another card or another payment method.

issuing-payment.description: Already posted the same request in the last minute

message.es:
Realizaste un pago similar hace instantes.
Intenta nuevamente en unos minutos.
message.en:
You made a similar payment moments ago.
Try again in a few minutes.
We could not process your payment.

message.es:
¡Listo, se acreditó tu pago!
En tu resumen verás el cargo de amount como statement_descriptor.
message.en:
Done, your payment was accredited!
You will see the charge for amount in your bill as statement_descriptor.

message.es:
Estamos procesando el pago.
En menos de una hora te enviaremos por e-mail el resultado.
message.en:
We are processing the payment.
In less than an hour we will e-mail you the results.

message.es:
Estamos procesando el pago.
En menos de 2 días hábiles te diremos por e-mail si se acreditó o si necesitamos más información.
message.en:
We are processing the payment.
In less than 2 business days we will tell you by e-mail whether it has accredited or we need more information.
We could not process your payment.

message.es: Debes autorizar ante payment_method_id el pago de amount a MercadoPago
message.en: You must authorize to payment_method_id the payment of amount to MercadoPago

message.es:
Llama a payment_method_id para que active tu tarjeta.
El teléfono está al dorso de tu tarjeta.
message.en:
Call payment_method_id to activate your card.
The phone is on the back of your card.
We could not process your payment.

message.es:
Ya hiciste un pago por ese valor.
Si necesitas volver a pagar usa otra tarjeta u otro medio de pago.
message.en:
You already made a payment for that amount.
If you need to repay, use another card or other payment method.

message.es:
Tu pago fue rechazado.
Elige otro de los medios de pago, te recomendamos con medios en efectivo.
message.en:
Your payment was rejected.
Choose another payment method. We recommend cash.
Your payment_method_id do not have sufficient funds.

message.es:
Llegaste al límite de intentos permitidos.
Elige otra tarjeta u otro medio de pago.
message.en: payment_method_id does not process payments in installments installments.
